voice.notInFrame: Position yourself in front of the camera
voice.incompleteData: Your entire body should be in view
voice.occludedFeet: Move the device so that your feet are in view.
voice.cameraTooHigh: Try lowering your device to waist high
voice.cameraTooLow: Try raising your device to waist high
voice.emptySpaceTop: Try lowering your device to waist high
voice.emptySpaceBottom: Try raising your device to waist high
voice.badLegPose: Spread your feet shoulder width apart
voice.badArmPose: Extend your arms out by your side and make a fist
voice.rightArmRaised: Extend your arms out by your side and make a fist
voice.leftArmRaised: Extend your arms out by your side and make a fist
voice.badArmAlignment: Extend your arms out by your side and make a fist

leveling.title: Device Placement
leveling.description: Position your device waist high and use the next screen to level it.

text.completeMessage: Please remain in this spot for the remainder of the body mapping session.

voice.prepare: Stand in front of your phone so that your entire body is viewable.
voice.complete: Remain in this spot for the remainder of the body mapping session.
voice.completeMessage: Remain in this spot for the remainder of the body mapping session.

voice.prepare: Make a pose with your feet shoulder width apart and your arms extended out to your side. Make a Fist.
Prepare to make a full turn and wait for count down.

finished.title: Scan Complete!
finished.description: Your scan has been successfully captured.
